name: The SUGRA Project
description:
In pursuit of your friend and professor who went missing searching for the origin of magic, you follow her footsteps to temple Sirang Langit. Utilizing the magical, gravity defying bracer she left you; you start the trek to the source of all magical items. Traverse an abandoned and desolate temple and follow the clues left behind by your missing colleague. While seeking her location, something draws you deeper into the heart of the temple revealing secrets better left buried.    

The Sugra Project is a first person puzzle experience crafted by game design students at New York Film Academy over the course of 15 weeks. While utilizing our team's unique approach to defying gravity, players can expect hand-crafted environments tailored to tell them a visual story of the fall of magic in this world.
